svad:
This property verifies that the NibCnt signal is properly reset to 16'h0 when the Reset signal is asserted. 

Specifically, on every rising edge of the MTxClk clock, if the Reset signal becomes 1, then in the very next clock cycle the NibCnt signal must equal 16'h0. The verification is disabled when the Reset signal is 0.
